title.narrative: Needs Analysis of Orphans and Vulnerable Children in Porto Novo, Benin

description.narrative: The main problem we want to address ultimately is the lack of access to education and integrated support for orphans and vulnerable children (OVCs) in Benin. Currently, we lack whole knowledge of various target groupsâ€™ priority needs and of all the possible root barriers to accessing education. YACI and EDEMâ€™s members feel they need to strengthen their relationship and joint planning, and their credibility towards donors, through direct contact and monitoring on the field. The above problems will be addressed by conducting a field research and consultation with children, young people, families, teachers, local authorities, local influencers, other NGOs, entrepreneurs and businesses, micro-credit organisations, agricultural centres, etc. These activities will result in a research document gathering information regarding childrenâ€™s needs, structural and immediate obstacles to education, and establishing a baseline survey to help track the progress of outcomes in the future. Based on the results, YACI and EDEM will design a 5 year plan. The results of this research will be shared with the people and organisations involved in the consultation. If organisations are interested to work with us, small pilot projects will be designed to work in partnership with them on concrete actions to support children more comprehensively.
